title: Open and Linked Data Meetup: Manchester, 24 September

details.excerpt: On Wednesday 24th September the [DaPaaS project](http://project.dapaas.eu) team will be gathering in Manchester for our fourth project meeting.
details.content:
On Wednesday 24th September the DaPaaS project team will be gathering in Manchester for our fourth project meeting.

To coincide with this, we will be hosting an Open and Linked Data meetup to introduce the project and discuss all things data-related.

Whether you're an expert or you're just getting started with linked open data, we'll be discussing the functionality the DaPaaS platform will offer, the technologies being used, the challenges the tool seeks to overcome (and how we plan to do so) and answer any other questions you have. There will also be time for an open discussion, when we will ask attendees for their feedback and suggestions.

If you can join us, the meetup will be hosted at Cornerhouse (70 Oxford Street, Manchester) from 6pm.
